content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1611568530577{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”confetti-sep new-page-section1″][vc_column el_class=”new-row1-column”]

[vc_column_text]

Online course platforms that lead to profit

You’re an expert in your field and you’re ready to start
sharing your message with the world.

You’ve been working tirelessly on content and have put your heart and soul into video tutorials and a ton of fantastic digital resources.

You’ve carefully planned out the inclusions of each week, and your marketing
collateral is ready to go.

Now, it’s time to bring it all to life!

With the notion of online learning gaining more momentum than ever before, physical distance is no longer a barrier: it’s never been easier to reach and connect with a global audience through a monetised digital platform.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1611806676233{background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}” el_class=”lp-main-section”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611552850769{padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/bg-course.jpg?id=14953) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”forceBgRight”][vc_empty_space height=”460px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611739768382{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}” el_class=”normPadColMobile right-col-padding”][vc_column_text]

What is AccessAlly?

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]If you’re reading this, you’re likely an entrepreneur or business owner passionate about taking your brand to the next (digital) level, by creating and monetising an online course or educational program.

AccessAlly is a plug-in that seamlessly integrates with your WordPress website to create a powerful online course platform packed full of fantastic features.

With an online course platform like AccessAlly,you can keep users engaged, motivated, and active as they progress through your course.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]AccessAlly features include:[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

  • Membership onboarding
  • Course and module overviews
  • Multiple lessons within each module
  • Video content

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]

  • Assignments and quizzes
  • Digital downloads
  • Webinars and livestreams
  • Exclusive online forums

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”][vc_column_text]

  • Membership onboarding
  • Course and module overviews
  • Multiple lessons within each module
  • Video content
  • Assignments and quizzes
  • Digital downloads
  • Webinars and livestreams
  • Exclusive online forums

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text]Whatever your niche, AccessAlly is the perfect way to sell your knowledge and your value online!

Want to know more? Confetti Design’s talented team of developers will craft an attractive AccessAlly course that converts: contact us to find out how.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1611553221718{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes”][vc_column_inner el_class=”normPadColTBMobile left-col-padding” width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611739778253{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Online course payments

A number of payment and subscriptions options are available, so you can choose one best suited to your course and offer.

For example, you can:

  • Present individual lessons for rent (limited access) or purchase (unlimited access)
  • Provide ongoing subscriptions that create a paywall between free and exclusive content
  • Offer one-off payment for a customised time period (you can also offer payment plans)

Your business model and goals are unique – and with Confetti Design, we’ll help you unleash your talent, knowledge, and expertise with an extremely intuitive, sophisticated, and user-friendly online course platform.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”forceBgLeft” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1611553289448{background-image: url(https://confettidesign.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/bg-course2.jpg?id=14955) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”400px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
